Belatrix Hackatrix tries to motivate people to participate in the events organized by Belatrix Software at a global level, looking for consolidation as a leading technology company.
Because we want to take action and improve our working environment. Because we can. Because we believe in technology and mobile world.
Belatrix Hackatrix was created by people really motivated doing geeky stuff and living passionated about mobile technology.
